title: Game is constantly flashing black (think strobe) since the new client was installed
body:
Hi there, 

I recently installed the new client and all seems well with everything until I begin loading into the game

It will show the screen as normal however it was non stop flash black like a strobe.

I enter the game and it continues to happen. Practically unplayable. Fiddled with the setting, followed youtubes of old and checked my own setting. The only slight change came for reticking the vertical sync under the fps cap selection.

It has happened 3 out of 3 times plus carries over into customs. 

Only thing that has changed was the new client being installed. 

Does anyone know how to fix it or if its a known bug?

replies.body:
I have this problem as well, I made sure i had the current drivers but still occurring. The only way I found to fix it is to go borderless (which has its own problems on dual monitor set up)

Should add I'm using a geforce GPU which had no issues like this until today.

Hey there,

Sounds to me like you might be experiencing a problem with your GPU.

Have you updated your drivers recently?
